channel.title: Comments on: Could He Be the One?
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
Everyone seems to want to make their own copy of the game.
I have the VASSAL electronic version of the Avalon Hill game, but it isn't quite the same as a physical copy.
I wish Fantasy Flight had also obtained the Dune rights instead of re-theming the game in the Twilight Imperium universe.
item.content:encoded:
Everyone seems to want to make their own copy of the game.

I have the VASSAL electronic version of the Avalon Hill game, but it isn’t quite the same as a physical copy.

I wish Fantasy Flight had also obtained the Dune rights instead of re-theming the game in the Twilight Imperium universe.

item.title: By: Jonathan Leistiko
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Leistiko
item.description:
The new books with Brian and Kevin are atrociously painful. I'm impressed that you made it 100 pages in.
I'm satisfying my Dune craving my making an Avalon Hill Dune board game set.
item.content:encoded:
The new books with Brian and Kevin are atrociously painful. I’m impressed that you made it 100 pages in.

I’m satisfying my Dune craving my making an Avalon Hill Dune board game set.
